issue.title: [PDTS] Make namespaces consistent with Library TS policy

discussion.p: The PDTS used a placeholder namespace "tbs" since the Standard Library policy for TS namespaces had not yet been fully articulated.
discussion.note: 2014-02-11 Issaquah: Project editor to make indicated changes to WP, post notice on lib and SG3 reflectors.

resolution.p: Throughout the WP, change namespace "tbs" to "experimental" as described in the Library Fundamentals TS working paper, 1.3 Namespaces and headers [general.namespaces].
